text: Frank Williams (2 July 1931 â€“ 26 June 2022)GRO Registers of Birth: SEP 1931 1a 774 HAMPSTEAD - Frank J. Williams, mmn = Myles was an English actor. He was best known for playing the Reverend Timothy Farthing in the popular BBC comedy Dad's Army.Original cast of Dad's Army reunited Williams died on 26 June 2022 at his home in Edgware, Greater London, one week before his 91st birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Actors from London Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:People from Hampstead
